note.p: Birth: Shawford, near Frome, Somerset, England (22 June 1815)
Death: His son's residence, High Street, Lower Norwood, Surrey (23 July 1877)
Career: Lecturer, Chemistry, St George's Hospital, London
References: S Ross, 'Faraday Consults the Scholars: the Origins of the Terms of Electrochemistry' in NR 1961 vol 16 pp 187-220, plate
